task.title: How to add numbers
task.shortdesc: Here you will find instructions for using the addition function of the JPS Calculation App.

prereq.p: To succussfully add numbers, you must know what addition is.

taskbody.result:
p
The result of the addition is displayed.

example.p: The equation will look like this: 5 + 7.
You enter 5. Press plus. Enter 7 Press the equal sign.
The result of 12 will appear on the screen.
